title_tib: 'PHAGS PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI YE SHES RGYAS PA'I MDO SDE RIN PO CHE MTHA' YAS PA MTHAR PHYIN PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO
title_eng: An Exalted Sutra of the Greater Way entitled "The Ultimate End of the Infinite Jewels of the Sutras of the Widespreading Wisdom of the Victorious Buddhas" (Ārya Niṣṭhāgata Bhagavaj Jñāna Vaipulya Sūtra Ratna Ananta Nāma Mahāyāna Sūtra)', 'text')
